changeSet.author: jamshid
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS decathlon_events ( id BIGINT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, eventType VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, sport VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, coefficient_a NUMERIC(10, 4) NOT NULL, coefficient_b NUMERIC(10, 2) NOT NULL, coefficient_c NUMERIC(10, 2) NOT NULL ); INSERT INTO decathlon_events (eventType, sport, coefficient_a, coefficient_b, coefficient_c) VALUES ('FIELD_EVENT', 'LONG_JUMP', 0.14354, 220, 1.4), ('FIELD_EVENT', 'HIGH_JUMP', 0.8465, 75, 1.42), ('FIELD_EVENT', 'DISCUS_THROW', 12.91, 4, 1.1), ('FIELD_EVENT', 'POLE_VAULT', 0.2797, 100, 1.35), ('FIELD_EVENT', 'JAVELIN_THROW', 10.14, 7, 1.08), ('TRACK_EVENT', 'ONE_HUNDRED_METER', 25.4347, 18, 1.81), ('TRACK_EVENT', 'FOUR_HUNDRED_METER', 5.74352, 28.5, 1.92);
